ai.question: Refer to the graphic. What two types of devices are the printer and the IP phone? (Choose two.)

choice.text: The IP phone is a peripheral.
The IP phone is a host.
The IP phone is a network device.
The printer is a network device.

form-item.ai: provides minimal securityno centralized administration inexpensivepotential impact on performanceeasy to set-upno special hardware AdvantagesDisadvantages Determine if the characteristics are an advantage or disadvantage of a peer-to-peer network. Drag each characteristic from the left to the appropriate category on the right.123456no titleno description given3564211Advantages=easy setup, inexpensive, no special hardware Disadvantages=no centralized admin, performance impact, minimal security

ai.question: Which two statements accurately describe a router ARP table and routing table? (Choose two.)

choice.text: The ARP table contains information about individual devices, not networks.
The ARP table contains information about networks, not individual devices.
The ARP table contains information about networks and individual devices.
The routing table contains information about individual devices, not networks.
The routing table contains information about networks, not individual devices.
The routing table contains information about networks and individual devices.

ai.question: What process can a user perform on the host so that a folder on a remote server is treated as if it were a local resource?

form-item.ai: Share files with another device.Download a music file from a website.Play a video game with a friend across a network.Participate in a videoconference with another computer.Connect to an e-learning site to learn networking.Store e-mail to deliver it upon request. ClientServerBoth a Client and Server Determine if the tasks performed would be considered the role of a client, server, or both. Drag the task from the left to the appropriate category on the right.123456no titleno description given5216431Client=download music, connect e-learning; Server=device sharing files, stores email; Both=video game, instant messenger

ai.question: Refer to the graphic. If H1 on SwitchA needs to forward a frame to H3 on SwitchB, which MAC address is used as the destination MAC within the frame?

Refer to the graphic. Two network segments, LAN-A and LAN-B, directly connect to Router1. When Router1 receives a message with a source address of PC1 on LAN-A and a destination address of PC10 on LAN-B, what will be the action of Router1?

choice.text: The router checks its ARP table to determine where to forward the packet to reach PC10.
The router checks its ARP table to determine the appropriate IP address of PC10.
The router checks its routing table to determine where to forward the packet to reach PC10.
The router checks its routing table to determine the appropriate MAC address of PC10.

ai.question: Which three pieces of information are included in a network physical map? (Choose three.)

choice.text: location and length of cable runs
physical location of all networking devices
location and size of broadcast and collision domains
hardware configuration of end devices such as hosts and servers

ai.question: When using Windows XP, which command shows information about the computer, including IP address, subnet mask, default gateway, and additional details about DHCP and DNS?
In what area of a network can traffic from other hosts cause a sending host to stop transmitting, then wait a random amount of time before resending a message?
